features: build a customized Notion template/dashboard/workspace from scratch; customize or improve your existing Notion workspace; integrate a template into your existing Notion workspace; We hop on of free 15-20 minutes call and see if we are a great match; After the call, I give you access to a submit page, where you can tell me all the details of the project; I will send you a free quote (price and expected delivery time) within 2 business days; My price starts at $500
